markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 19"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pale Fade](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2010)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 70 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 6,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Pale fade is a white ointment with a sharp, earthy scent. The poison rapidly desiccates flesh, which then crumbles and forms a cloud of pallid dust. If the victim is [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) by this poison, then the cloud of dust also conceals other creatures from the victim.

 **Saving Throw** DC 42 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 10d6 poison damage and [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (1 round); Stage 2 12d6 poison damage, drained 1, and concealed (1 round); **Stage 3** 15d6 poison damage, drained 1, and concealed (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Pale Fade
